wikipedia_page.main:
(Thomas) Gerald Case (1905 – 22 May 1985) was a British film and television actor known for his role
in the 1976 Wodehouse Playhouse episode, 'Strychnine in the Soup'.He was the son of Captain Thomas Elphinstone Case, of the Coldstream Guards, and Evelyn Ruby, daughter of Adolphus Ferguson. His widowed mother subsequently married the England cricketer and gold-medal-winning Olympic boxer J. W. H. T. Douglas.Case lived at Mayfield, Windlesham, Surrey, where he died on 22 May 1985.
